messages.title: Claire Says...
messages.content: I want my children and their children to live in a fairer, kinder, more equal and more sustainable world. A Green world. This snap general election is a response to the politics of the past, a politics in which the government holds the country hostage to a small, self-interested, ideological sub group in parliament. With our focus on solving the housing crisis, fighting for young people and having a say in the Brexit deal, the Green Party is standing up to this self-serving politicking. There really is a better way.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit and has the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country and our place in the world.
To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment, build affordable homes, provide properly funded public services, and put power back in the hands of citizens through a democracy.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up.

issues.health: Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future.

images.caption: Your Green Party Candidate Claire Lasko

examples: Every Green vote on 8th June will help make that vision a reality.
This election isn’t about the next 5 years. It’s about the next 50 years.
To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services.
The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government’s extreme Brexit.
To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.
This snap general election is a response to the politics of the past, a politics in which the government holds the country hostage to a small, self-interested, ideological sub group in parliament.
The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up.
